articles.title: Congratulations to Tunisian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Tunisian President

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Al Moncef Al Marzouki on his election as president of Tunisia. 
					
					Kim Yong Nam in his message hoped that the Tunisian president would achieve success in his work for political stability and economic development of the country. 
					
					He expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Tunisia would invariably grow stronger.

articles.title: Congratulations to Sudanese FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Sudanese FM

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Friday sent a congratulatory message to Ali Ahmed Karti on his reappointment as foreign minister of Sudan. 
					
					In the message he wished his Sudanese counterpart bigger success in his work, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Greeting to President of Niger
articles.content:
Greeting to President of Niger

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Mahamadou Issoufou, president of Niger, on Friday on the day of proclamation of the Republic of Niger. 
					
					In the message Kim wished the president and people of Niger successes in the work for stability and economic development of the country, expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop.

articles.title: Greeting to Emir of Qatar
articles.content:
Greeting to Emir of Qatar

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Sheikh Hamad Bin Khalifa Al-Thani, emir of Qatar, on its independence day.
					
					Kim in the message sincerely wished the emir happiness in good health and the people of Qatar progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greeting to PM of Qatar
articles.content:
Greeting to PM of Qatar

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Saturday sent a message of greeting to his Qatari counterpart Sheikh Hamad Bin Jassim Bin Jabr Al-Thani on the independence day of the country.
					
					Expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily develop in all fields, the message wished him new success in the work for development and modernization of the country.

articles.title: NIS Accused of Charging Innocent Person with Spying for North
articles.content:
NIS Accused of Charging Innocent Person with Spying for North

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Pusan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a press conference in Pusan on Wednesday stroke out at the puppet National Intelligence Service (NIS) for groundlessly investigating an official of the headquarters on charges of spying for the north. 
					
					Speakers in the conference recalled that last year the Pusan branch of the NIS investigated a secretary of the organization, charging that he received operational funds from the north. 
					
					It is groundless for the branch to insist that 90 million won in his personal bankbook are the operational funds he received from the north, contended the speakers.
					
					They urged the NIS to bear responsibility for faking up a false story and charging an innocent person with spying.
					
					The NIS engrossed in making false stories will never be able to evade severe judgment by the people, they warned.

articles.title: Senior State Officials Visit Sukchon County
articles.content:
New Natural Gas Field Discovered in Iran

					Tehran, December 16 (KCNA) -- A new natural gas field was recently discovered in the waters off the northern area of Iran.
					
					The deposit is estimated to be 50 trillion cubic feet.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 50th Anniversary of New System of Agricultural Guidance
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 50th Anniversary of New System of Agricultural Guidance

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place in Sukchon County, South Phyongan Province Saturday to mark the 50th anniversary of the new system of agricultural guidance created by President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Present at the meeting were Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam, officials of ministries and national institutions and those in the agricultural field of provinces, cities and counties and working people in Sukchon County. 
					
					Kim Il Sung visited the county on December 18, 1961. He saw to it that county co-operative farm management committee was set up as an institution specializing in the agricultural guidance with the county as a unit. He also defined the structure of the committee and number of its staff and specified its duty and method of work.
					
					This socialist agricultural guidance system makes it possible to give business guidance, rather than administrative guidance to agriculture, organically combine the public ownership with cooperative ownership and boost the state guidance and assistance to the cooperative management.
					
					Kim Rak Hui, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and vice-premier of the Cabinet, in a report said the creation of the system was a historic event of a turning effect in improving and completing the system and method of guiding the cooperative economy and solving problems arising in socialist rural construction and agriculture.
					
					Under the President's wise guidance the system has displayed its advantages and vitality, thereby bringing about a fresh turn in developing socialist agricultural management and production, the reporter said, adding:
					
					The President's original ideology and undying leadership feats on the system have been steadily developed in depth to reach a new higher stage by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Ten odd years are shining as a historic period in which a drastic turn has been effected in the guidance and management of the socialist agriculture with the unique ideologies, theories and policies set forth by Kim Jong Il as guidelines.
					
					The big achievements made in the socialist agricultural development in the era of Songun are a striking manifestation of the advantages and attraction of the Juche-oriented system of agricultural guidance, the reporter said, calling on all the officials and working people in the field of agriculture to greet the centenary of birth of the President with pride and dignity.

articles.title: Geographical Book of Eastern Country
articles.content:
Geographical Book of Eastern Country

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Geographical Book of the Eastern Country is one of the Korean nation's cultural heritages.
					
					The book, published in 1640, deals with the history, topography, capitals, territories and military equipment of Ancient Korea, Koguryo, Paekje, Silla and Koryo. It was printed from wooden blocks and stencil. 
					
					The one-volume book was written by Han Paek Gyom (1522-1615), a realist and geographer.

articles.title: Junggang Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Junggang Revolutionary Site

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Junggang Revolutionary Site is situated in Jagang Province in the northern part of the DPRK. 
					
					The site is associated with revolutionary activities of Kim Hyong Jik, an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea. 
					
					Staying at Junggang Inn as a medical man with his family members, he conducted activities to rally the proletarian masses and separate armed organizations for the anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					President Kim Il Sung, a son of Kim Hyong Jik, helped him in his revolutionary activities, receiving patriotic and revolutionary education from his father. 
					
					Seen in the site are a statue of Kim Hyong Jik, a monument to his revolutionary activities and the Junggang Revolutionary Museum.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Qualitative Progress in Economic Construction
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Qualitative Progress in Economic Construction

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- All the officials, party members and other working people should push ahead with the industrial revolution of the new century and usher in a rosy morrow  of Songun Korea under the guidance of the great Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday makes this call in an editorial. 
					
					The industrial revolution in the new century is like a statement declaring that the socialist economy of the DPRK is entering the highest level of modernization and civilization and an eruption of the strong stamina of the DPRK dashing towards the peak of the world in reliance on its own inexhaustible intellectual potentials, it says, adding:
					
					This revolution is an inevitable demand for building a socialist economic power at present, a course through which the economy of the DPRK has made drastic change in its development under the Workers' Party of Korea's far-sighted and wise guidance based on science and a Korean-style technological revolution that has been accelerated by superiority and might of socialism.  
					
					The DPRK has sought to solve everything by developing, accumulating and using intellectual resources in a planned and purposeful manner under the guidance of the party and state as well as giving free rein to collective power of all the people including scientists, technicians and producers. This is the industrial revolution in the new century what the DPRK calls a great cause. 
					
					The industrial revolution is a turning point meant for a fresh upturn in quality in the Juche-oriented industry and a historic event that gives spurs to the advance of the DPRK towards the emergence of a thriving nation. 
					
					The DPRK has the self-supporting economy with solid foundation and tremendous potentials provided and accumulated in the protracted historical struggle. It also has a huge army of intellectuals, advantageous socialist education system and almighty heroic people that are able to carry out the historic cause of industrial revolution. 
					
					All the officials, party members and other working people should turn out in the industrial revolution to put the national economy on a higher stage of development in terms of quality and more strikingly demonstrate the might of single-minded unity of Songun Korea and its spirit of great innovation and rapid progress.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges Worldwide Movement to Foil Imperialists' Double-Standard Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges Worldwide Movement to Foil Imperialists' Double-Standard Policy

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The world peace-loving people should wage a vigorous struggle to foil the double-standard policy of the imperialists that has been denied in history, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					
					The United States and other imperialists have pursued double standards to address international issues in their favor and force other nations to accept their demands, says the article.
					
					It cites detailed facts to expose that they have applied the unjust double-standard policy in such international issues as human rights, terrorism, nuclear activities.
					
					The DPRK has been a target of their more persistent application of this policy, it notes, and goes on to say: 
					
					It is an inadmissible insult and slander to the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and height of the application of double-standard policy for the imperialists to raise its "human rights issue". 
					
					The imperialists also spoke ill of the DPRK's satellite launch. This shows to what extent their double-standard policy has reached.
					
					Their double-standard policy wrecks international security and stability, makes one take justice for injustice and vice versa and prevents the principles of equality and impartiality in international relations from keeping. 
					
					This policy does not disappear itself. It will become impotent only when the world people valuing peace and aspiring after independence strive to solve international issues in the principles of equality and impartiality.

articles.title: All Koreans Urged to Preserve National Independence in Reunification Movement: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
All Koreans Urged to Preserve National Independence in Reunification Movement: Rodong Sinmun

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The triumph of the cause of national reunification hinges on encouraging all Koreans to pool their efforts in the vigorous movement for it while adhering to the principle of national independence. 
					
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined article.
					
					National independence is a fundamental principle to be preserved by all Koreans in the struggle for reunifying the country, says the article, adding:
					
					To deny this principle and depend on foreign forces is an anti-reunification treachery. The movement for national reunification, which had made long strides after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, is now going through turns and twists. This is because the south Korean ruling forces have persisted in the confrontation between the north and the south, depending on the anti-reunification foreign forces and in coordination with them.  
					
					The driving forces for national reunification are not a privileged class or stratum, but all Koreans and their might depends on unity.   They should unite as one under the banner of national independence to fully discharge their responsibility and role as the driving forces for national reunification. 
					
					In south Korea the pro-American flunkeyist ruling forces are getting hell-bent on the anti-reunification moves in cahoots with foreign forces while denying the principle of national independence and the idea of "By our nation itself". This reality teaches a lesson that the national reunification can never be achieved unless the Koreans foil the moves of traitors obsessed with sycophancy towards the U.S. and dependence on foreign forces. 
					
					Whether to pursue national independence or dependence on outsiders is a litmus paper distinguishing reunification from division and patriotism from treachery.
					
					In the course of the struggle for national reunification there can be change in terms of its detailed method according to situation, but no change in the principle and stand of national independence.

articles.title: S. Korean Dictatorial Regime Riddled with Corruption
articles.content:
S. Korean Dictatorial Regime Riddled with Corruption

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Irregularities and corruption are being disclosed so frequently among the ruling quarters in south Korea these days that there is uproar that the present regime is heading for the miserable end of the erstwhile dictators.
					
					It is practice and ulcer of the successive dictatorial ruling quarters to meet a miserable end before the expiry of their tenure of office due to disclosure of a chain of world shocking scams.
					
					The present puppet conservative ruling quarters are putting the successive dictators into the shade in such scandals.
					
					Shortly ago, the chief executive let his family member illegally purchase real estate under the pretence of acquiring a house to be used after his retirement, sparking off public outcry.
					
					His family members and confidents are all well-known robbers.
					
					It was brought to light that a relative of his wife received billions of won from the managing director of the Seoul Bus Transportation Group with a sweet promise that he would help him in the election as chief of the "Grand National Party" on the basis of proportional representation.
					
					It was also disclosed recently that an aide to Ri Sang Duk, lawmaker from the GNP who is elder brother of the chief executive, received nearly billion won from a group and the secretary and his staff were involved in this scam in an organized manner.
					
					Countless are cases of scams committed by Ri Sang Duk by abusing the power of his younger brother. He interfered in personnel affairs of the present "government," pocketing a fabulous amount of money and making sure that financial allocations were focused on his hometown.
					
					A cousin on the side of the chief executive's wife expropriated a huge amount of money from big businesses and government officials with the promise of their promotion.
					
					The above-said scandals are becoming more rampant among the ruling quarters as the term of their office is drawing close.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Psychological Warfare under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Psychological Warfare under Fire

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military set up two light towers in the central and eastern fronts and turned their light on as part of their intensified "psychological warfare against the north." The towers are the first means for the "warfare" that had been set up since the 2004 north-south agreement on removing all propaganda means from the areas along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL).
					
					Papers Saturday in bylined commentaries brand the "psychological warfare" as an open declaration of confrontation and a serious politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK as well as a very dangerous act prompted by their criminal intention to kick up fresh armed conflict between the north and the south.
					
					Rodong Sinmun says that any provocation against the other party may lead to an armed conflict and a total war amid tensions running high between the north and the south.
					
					It goes on:
					
					Whenever they kicked up "psychological warfare against the north" the south Korea warlike forces created a war atmosphere in the areas along the MDL while calling for tougher military posture under the pretext of coping with possible "provocation" from the DPRK.
					
					The puppet forces are making fuss about setting up defense wall and the like around the two towers.
					
					This indicates that the south Korean bellicose forces' anti-DPRK psychological warfare is a sinister plot designed to hurt the single-minded unity of the DPRK and ignite a war of aggression against it and, at the same time, to advertise their "security crisis."
					
					This warfare will only bring unpredictable catastrophic consequences, making the south Korean conservative authorities stop short of serving out a full term.
					
					Minju Joson terms the erection of the towers by the south Korean authorities part of their anti-DPRK psychological warfare aimed at deliberately getting on the nerves of the DPRK, saying lurking behind this is a black-hearted scheme to tide over the ruling crisis.

articles.title: Privatization of Education Field Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Privatization of Education Field Protested in S. Korea

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Government Employees' Union and the University Trade Union in south Korea held a press conference outside the Ministry of the Education Science and Technology on Dec. 14 in protest against the puppet group's moves to privatize the education field.
					
					The puppet authorities are making desperate efforts to privatize state and public universities under the pretext of restructuring.
					
					In September the ministry set out to the restructuring of several universities including Kunsan and Kang-Weon universities despite broad public protest.
					
					They seek to mend the regulations on accounting so as to retract all the measures that had been taken to address the financial shortage of state universities.
					
					They even try to abolish the system that had been set up thanks to the past struggle for campus democracy.
					
					At the conference speakers termed the authorities' university restructuring a shameless act to put universities under their control.
					
					It is the only way out for universities to force the present regime, which pursues wrong education policy, to step down, they said, declaring they would actively fight against the authorities.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Prosecution Accused of Fascist Crackdown
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Prosecution Accused of Fascist Crackdown

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law", the association for urgent measures against NSL and the "Civic and Public Joint Measure Committee for Coping with Suppression of Pomminryon (Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification)" in south Korea held a press conference on Thursday outside the Seoul Central District Court accusing the south Korean puppet prosecution of its unjust repressive action.
					
					The speakers at the conference denounced the puppet prosecution for issuing an arrest warrant for Li Thae Yong, member of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, on charges of violating the ill-famed "National Security Law," adding that at least 120 persons are now being subject to fascist suppression on charges of involvement in the so-called "spyring case".
					
					They charged that the puppet prosecution is linking the South Headquarters of Pomminryon with this case in a bid to justify its fabrication of the above-said "spyring case" and hold in check the activities for reunification.
					
					The on-going repressive racket is nothing but an artifice to cover up its sordid nature, they noted, demanding the treacherous and anti-reunification fascist law be repealed at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Soldier Attempts Suicide
articles.content:
S. Korean Soldier Attempts Suicide

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A soldier of a south Korean puppet army unit stationed in Kohung County, South Jolla Province attempted suicide on Thursday, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					
					The soldier attempted suicide by shooting himself after leaving behind a note to the effect that he could no longer endure all sorts of violence and harsh treatment by seniors.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Mechanized Forces Stage Anti-DPRK Exercises
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Mechanized Forces Stage Anti-DPRK Exercises

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the south Korean puppet army staged joint military exercises in Mugon-ri drill ground in Phaju, Kyonggi Province on Dec. 15 for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK by mobilizing mechanized forces, according to Yonhap News of south Korea. 
					
					New type tanks, armored cars belonging to the Second Division of the U.S. imperialist aggression troops, tanks of three companies of the puppet army and huge forces including mechanized infantrymen took part in the firepower exercises under a simulated condition of crossing the front.
					
					They are staging military exercises almost every day to invade the DPRK after rounding off their scenario for invading the DPRK through a preemptive attack.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Works Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Works Published in Russia

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's works "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" and "Let Us All Live and Struggle Like Heroes" were brought out in pamphlet by the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries.
					
					The work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy", published on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), clarifies the idea that the Juche philosophy is the original philosophy evolved and systemized by its own peculiar principles and the revolutionary and popular philosophy which truly serves the purpose of the struggle of the popular masses for independence.
					
					It indicates the tasks to study and explain and disseminate the Juche philosophy as intended by the party and to fully embody it in revolutionary practices.
					
					The work "Let Us All Live and Struggle Like Heroes", published on May 15, Juche 77 (1988), explains the occasion and purpose of the National Meeting of Heroes and its historical significance and the idea of the Korean people's tradition of heroic struggles.
					
					It also clarifies the call of the Workers' Party of Korea on all the people to become heroes and live like them.
					
					A ceremony of releasing books took place in Moscow on December 12.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in different countries on Dec. 7 and 10 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 94th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero. They included seminars on feats in Mexico and Cambodia and a seminar on the Juche Idea in Uganda.
					
					Juan Campos Vega, chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other speakers, praised Kim Jong Il for strengthening and developing the KPA into a matchless army, a guardian of the socialist cause and a driving force of revolution.
					
					They noted Kim Jong Suk rendered distinguished services for the victory of the great anti-Japanese war and the cause of building the party, army and state and the development of the women's movement, true to the idea and leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					The feats performed by Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk are winning great admiration from the world progressive people struggling for socialism, they said.
					
					The general secretary of the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia said the defence capability of the DPRK has reached the highest level as it held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					Kim Jong Suk dedicated all her life to ensuring the safety of Kim Il Sung and thoroughly implementing his ideas and line, he noted.
					
					Auma-Okumu, head of the Juche Idea Study Group of the Department of Psychology of the Kyambogo University of Uganda, and other speakers stressed the DPRK is demonstrating its might as an invincible political and military power thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Studied in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Studied in Switzerland

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea held a seminar on leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" on Dec. 10.
					
					A report was delivered by Chairman of the Group Martin Lotscher to be followed by speeches.
					
					The reporter and speakers referred to the fact that in the work Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo put forth by President Kim Il Sung as the three charters for national reunification, thus providing a firm guideline for national reunification.
					
					They deeply explained that the successes made in the inter-Korean relations after the publication of the work, the two north-south summit meetings and the publication of the historic June 15 north-south joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in particular, clearly prove that the movement to reunify Korea is making a dynamic advance along the road indicated by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					The inter-Korean relations have been brought to the worst phase due to the anti-DPRK smear campaign and the anti-reunification moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities, but all the Korean people in the north and the south are making sustained energetic endeavors for the country's reunification, they held.
					
					Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the Korean people will successfully carry out Kim Il Sung's instructions for national reunification to the last, they said.

articles.title: All-People Compulsory Tree-Planting in China
articles.content:
All-People Compulsory Tree-Planting in China

					Beijing, December 16 (KCNA) -- China is planning sustained brisk activities for all-people compulsory tree-planting.
					
					It plans to plant a total of 26 billion trees through these activities for ten years to come.

articles.title: Earthquake Hits Central Indonesia
articles.content:
Earthquake Hits Central Indonesia

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 6.3 on Richter scale jolted central parts of Indonesia on Tuesday, the country's Meteorology and Geophysics Agency reported.
					
					The epicenter was at 71 km southeast Gorontalo city of Gorontalo province.

articles.title: Flood Damage on Increase in Thailand
articles.content:
Flood Damage on Increase in Thailand

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- In Thailand the number of victims due to the flood is on the increase.
					
					As of Dec. 14, the dead increased to 708 and the missed 3.
					
					In the middle region more than 3 600 villages of 9 provinces are still inundated with water and in 8 provinces of the southern region 189 square kilometers of farmland are ruined along with 783 roads and 113 bridges destroyed.
					
					In a province and a region 7 industrial complexes were flooded causing more than one million people to lose their jobs and a lot of economic losses.
					
					The government is taking measures to heal the damage.

articles.title: Oppressors Have No Option Other Than Dialogue with Iran: Iranian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje a Choummaly Sayasone

					Pyongyang, 1 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia primero un mensaje a Choummaly Sayasone, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, Presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao y del Comite Central de Defensa y Seguridad de la RDPL, para felicitarle por el 36o aniversario de la fundacion de la RDPL. 
					
					La misiva va como sigue: 
					
					En ocasion del 36o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, le hago llegar mis calurosas felicitaciones a Vd. y por su conducto, al Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y al gobierno y el pueblo de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao. 
					
					Despues de la fundacion de la Republica, el pueblo lao, siendo verdadero dueno del pais, vino consolidando y desarrollando constantemente el regimen democratico popular optado por si mismo y ha logrado en ese curso un gran desarrollo socioeconomico. 
					
					Nuestro pueblo se regocija de que bajo la direccion del PPRL encabezado por Vd., el pueblo fraternal de vuestro pais defiende el ideal socialista y fortalece el poderio estatal en su conjunto, y le desea de todo corazon exitos mas excelentes en la lucha por alcanzar las tareas y metas presentadas en el 9o Congreso del Partido. 
					
					Convencido de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Laos se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas conforme al noble proposito de los lideres de veterana generacion y a la aspiracion de los pueblos de los dos paises, le deseo de todo corazon a Vd. mayores exitos en su trabajo responsable y buena salud.

articles.title: Iran Ridicules U.S. for Opening Virtual Embassy
articles.content:
Iran Ridicules U.S. for Opening Virtual Embassy

					Tehran, December 16 (KCNA) -- The commander for mobilization of Iran, addressing a meeting on Dec. 14, scathingly accused the U.S. of opening a virtual embassy.
					
					The U.S. will need a virtual White House as it opened a virtual embassy in Tehran, he said, adding that the U.S. should think about the virtual White House now that the capitalist system is facing its ruin.
					
					The U.S. is now left with no option but to recover from its defeats and setbacks by playing computer games not only on virtual embassy but on virtual Iran and virtual Tehran, he ridiculed.

articles.title: New Natural Gas Field Discovered in Iran
articles.content:
New Natural Gas Field Discovered in Iran

					Tehran, December 16 (KCNA) -- A new natural gas field was recently discovered in the waters off the northern area of Iran.
					
					The deposit is estimated to be 50 trillion cubic feet.

articles.title: U.S. Extraterritorial Action Censured by Paper of Trinidad and Tobago
articles.content:
U.S. Extraterritorial Action Censured by Paper of Trinidad and Tobago

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Trinidad Guardian, a newspaper of Trinidad and Tobago, in a recent editorial denounced the U.S. for its extraterritorial action.
					
					The U.S. threw obstacles in the way of discussing the issue of the venue of the Cuba-Caricom summit held in Trinidad and Tobago, it said, labeling it an extraterritorial practice.
					
					The U.S. applied its outdated "Helums-Button Law" to that country, insulting its government and people, the paper said, adding that no moves of the U.S. can block the development of cooperative relations between Cuba and Caricom member nations.

articles.title: Damage by Global Warming in Sahel Region, Africa
articles.content:
Damage by Global Warming in Sahel Region, Africa

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Ecological environment is being damaged in the Sahel region of Africa due to global warming.
					
					The average temperature warmed up by 0.8 degrees Celsius and rainfall fell as much as 48 percent, according to recent study results of ecological environment of those counties in this region. One in six trees died between 1954 and 2002. In addition, one in five tree species disappeared locally.

articles.title: Cooperation among Asian Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Asian Countries

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- China and Mongolia on Dec. 13 pledged to enhance cooperation on law enforcement between the two countries.
					
					That day Cambodia and Laos agreed to expand military cooperation.

articles.title: Iranian Minister Says Sanctions on Its Central Bank "Choice for Failure"
articles.content:
Iranian Minister Says Sanctions on Its Central Bank "Choice for Failure"

					Tehran, December 16 (KCNA) -- Iranian Minister of Economic Affairs and Finance Shamseddin Hosseini said on Dec. 13 that imposing sanctions on the Central Bank of Iran was "a choice for failure." 
					
					Sanctions on the Central Bank of Iran are "illogical," he noted, adding that the country is fully prepared to deal with the Western "mischievous" acts.

articles.title: Gap between Rich and Poor Increases in U.S.
articles.content:
Gap between Rich and Poor Increases in U.S.

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The average income of the top 10 percent of Americans in 2008 was 114 000 dollars, nearly 15 times higher than that of the bottom 10 percent, according to a new research released by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) on Wednesday.

articles.title: Turkey Condemns Israel over New Settlements in West Bank
articles.content:
Turkey Condemns Israel over New Settlements in West Bank

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Turkish foreign ministry on Wednesday condemned Israel for its decision to build 40 new settlements and a farm in the Efrat region of the West Bank.
					
					The ministry said in a statement that Turkey strongly condemned Israel's latest decision to erect additional settlements on the Palestinian lands occupied by Israel in the West Bank.
					
					Israel's continued settlements in the occupied lands are in violation of the international laws, said the statement, adding that Israel's attitude will leave all the efforts for peace fruitless.

articles.title: Australian Consumer Confidence Slumps in December
articles.content:
Australian Consumer Confidence Slumps in December

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Index of consumer sentiment of Australia fell by 8.3 percent in December from 103.4 points in November to 94.7 points, its lowest level since August, an economic organization of the country said on Dec. 14.

articles.title: Britain's Unemployment Rate Hits New High in 15 Years
articles.content:
Britain's Unemployment Rate Hits New High in 15 Years

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The unemployment rate in Britain rose by 128 000 in the August-October period to 2.64 million, the highest level since 1994. 
					
					This was released by the British Office for National Statistics on Wednesday.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Stop Suppression of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Stop Suppression of Koreans in Japan

					Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Japanese authorities should immediately stop the suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), a dignified overseas citizens organization of the DPRK, and Koreans in Japan, Minju Joson Saturday urges in a bylined commentary. 
					
					It goes on:
					
					Recently the Japanese custom authorities searched luggage of Chongryon officials and other compatriots and students upon their return to Japan after their visit to the homeland and confiscated their personal belongings, claiming this action was taken at the instruction of the Ministry of Economy and Industry. 
					
					The confiscated things are cosmetics, art pieces, DVDs containing feature films the visitors got as souvenirs. They are, therefore, nothing problematic. 
					
					Lurking behind this action is a political aim which should never be overlooked. 
					
					The Japanese reactionaries have pursued a discriminating policy and hostile policy towards Chongryon and Koreans in Japan for the mere reason that Chongryon is an overseas citizens organization of the DPRK. 
					
					This despicable behavior of the Japanese authorities is a product of hostility towards the DPRK and extreme national chauvinism and a wanton violation of international law and human rights. 
					
					The Japanese reactionaries have followed such policy of national discrimination under the pretext that Chongryon is an organization of a country which they have no diplomatic ties and Koreans in Japan are citizens of that country. Not content with this, they are suppressing them. With nothing can they justify this attitude as it is a reckless behavior of those ignorant of elementary norms of international relations and conception of human rights. 
					
					This mean behavior only betrays their despicable nature and moral vulgarity in the international arena.

articles.title: Funcionarios coreanos recorren varios lugares de distrito de Sukchon
articles.content:
Funcionarios coreanos recorren varios lugares de distrito de Sukchon

					Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los cuadros directivos del Estado y otros funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales y de la rama agricola de todas las provincias ciudades y distritos recorrieron el dia 17 varios lugares del distrito de Sukchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					
					Choe Yong Rim y otros funcionarios visitaron el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de Sukchon.
					
					Los visitantes recorrieron los vestigios y datos de la historia revolucionaria al escuchar explicaciones sobre el hecho de que el Presidente preparo hace 50 anos el autoctono sistema de direccion agricola y creo el modelo de la construccion del campo socialista.
					
					A traves de la visita recordaron con emocion el inmenso trabajo del Presidente quien con su energica direccion hizo gran aporte al desarrollo de la economia rural socialista.
					
					Ellos tambien visitaron el Centro de Servicio de las Maquinas Agricolas, la Empresa de Riego, etc. del citado distrito.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia politica de pauta de doble rasero de imperialistas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia politica de pauta de doble rasero de imperialistas

					Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que los pueblos amantes de la paz del mundo deben luchar activamente por frustrar la politica de la pauta de doble rasero de los imperialistas repudiada por la historia.
					
					Estados Unidos y otros imperialistas interpretan y tratan a su favor los asuntos presentados en la palestra internacional con doble rasero e intentan imponer forzosamente sus demandas a otros paises, comienza el articulo y continua:
					
					Ellos aplican esta injusta politica en varios sectores de la palestra internacional incluyendo DDHH, el terror y el problema nuclear.
					
					Los imperialistas aplican mas brutalmente su politica de doble rasero sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Ellos le acusan de "asunto de DDHH", lo cual es imperdonable insulto y la difamacion a la dignidad y la soberania de la RPDC y el apogeo de la aplicacion de la injusta pauta de doble rasero.
					
					Lo prueba bien en acusarla del lanzamiento de satelite artificial.
					
					La politica de doble rasero destruye la seguridad y la estabilidad internacionales y hace comprender erroneamente la injusticia como justicia y no defender los principios de igualdad y la imparcialidad en las relaciones internacionales.
					
					Esta injusta politica de los imperialistas no se elimina por si solo.
					
					Solo cuando los pueblos del mundo aspirantes a la paz y la independencia luchen activamente por resolver los asuntos internacionales en los principios de la imparcialidad y la igualdad, la injusta politica de la pauta de doble rasero de los imperialistas no validara nada.

articles.title: Lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Junggang
articles.content:
Lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Junggang

					Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En su editorial difundido el día 17 el periódico Rodong Sinmun exhorta a todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores que bajo la dirección del Partido del Trabajo de Corea impulsen con dinamismo la revolución industrial de nuevo siglo y luchen por el futuro radiante de la Corea del Songun.
					
					La revolución industrial de nuevo siglo es una declaración de que la economía socialista de Corea ha alcanzado la cima de la modernización y civilización y que Corea marcha a todo galope hacia el mundo apoyándose en su firme potencial intelectual, comienza el editorial y continúa:
					
					La revolución industrial de nuevo siglo deviene la demanda importante en la actual construcción por la potencia económica socialista, el proceso de nuevo cambio del desarrollo de la economía coreana preparado y promovido por la presciencia científica y la sabia dirección del PTC y la revolución técnica al estilo coreano que se impulsa por la superioridad y el poderío del socialismo.
					
					Nuestra revolución industrial de nuevo siglo es la causa gigantesca que se realiza por el poderío del colectivismo de todo el pueblo como los científicos, los técnicos y los productores al desarrollar, acumular y aplicar de manera planificada y consciente los recursos intelectuales bajo la dirección del Partido y el Estado.
					
					Además constituye el punto de viraje del nuevo salto cualitativo de la industria autóctona y el evento histórico que redobla la velocidad del avance de nuestra patria que marcha a toda velocidad hacia la prosperidad.
					
					Son enormes la base y la potencialidad de la economía independiente preparada y acumulada en medio de la larga lucha histórica y nosotros contamos con la muchedumbre de intelectuales capaces de encargarse de la causa histórica de la revolución industrial y el ventajoso sistema de educación socialista y el heroico pueblo que no sabe la imposibilidad.
					
					Todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores deben levantarse como un solo hombre sosteniendo en alto la antorcha de la revolución industrial de nuevo siglo para poner nuestra economía en una nueva etapa de desarrollo en lo cualitativo y manifestar sin reserva el poderío de la unión monolítica de la Corea del Songun y el ímpetu de gran innovación y gran salto.

articles.title: Desarrollada nueva tecnologia de conservar calidad de aguas
articles.content:
Desarrollada nueva tecnologia de conservar calidad de aguas

					Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En estos dias, las unidades de cria de peces de Corea introducen ampliamente nuevo metodo de mantener la calidad de agua sin cambiarla.
					
					El instituto marino de Mar Este lo desarrollo con la  bacteria fotosintetica, una variedad de la bacteria de alta eficiencia en purificar el agua.
					
					A diferencia del metodo anterior de usar gran cantidad de agua en la cria de holoturias pequenas, la nueva manera mantiene de continuo el estable ambiente de calidad de agua sin cambiarla en el tanque.
					
					La citada bacteria produce las sustancias nutritivas necesarias al oxidar sustancias organicas, razon por la cual reduce la cantidad contenida de sustancias organicas en agua donde crecen los animales maritimos en cultivo, y cumple la funcion de estabilizar e incrementar la existencia de oxigeno y los valores de pH en un volumen determinada. 
					
					Ademas previene diferentes enfermedades de esos animales al producir las enzimas descompuestas de proteinas, resistentes a las enfermedades.
					
					Las unidades de piscicultura de varias regiones, incluyendo Hongwon, Yanghwa, Sinpho y Riwon de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, obtienen notables rendimientos al emplear el susodicho metodo.
					
					La bacteria fotosintetica esta registrada por el Instituto Estatal de Conservacion de Bacterias.
